text: Þis syndon þære are hide landgemæru to cudinclea<../images/tbar.gif>is þonne ærest on lytlan mædwe.
Þonne ondlong þære hege wære on cuggan hyl.
Of cuggan hylle on wytles leage.
Þonone ofer þa stræte on cynelde weorþe.
Of cynelde weorðe swa on þære lytlan mædwe, swa on swines heafde & þær wiðutan XII æcras.
Swa æfter þære stræte be þære wællan on sunder lond.
Of þon on omer lond þæt a be wudu þæt cymð eft to lytlan mædwe & to þrym gemærum.
And XXX æcra on þæm twæm feldan dal landes wiðutan.
Þis wæs gedon on Wynsiges gewitnesse decanus & alra þara munuca æt Wiogurna ceastre.
Brihtlaf wæs se forma man & nu hit stant his sunan on handan Byrhtwine & Byrhtmære.
